activities.title: Reading Example (TextContent)
activities.content:
TextContents/Readings can contain any markdown (https://www.markdownguide.org/basic-syntax/) formatting, including **bold**, _italic_, and [links](https://forwardinc.org). You can also include images like this:

![Example Image](example_image.png)

And you can include lists:

- Item 1
- Item 2
- Item 3

Or numbered lists:

1. First item
2. Second item
3. Third item. 

 Headers are also supported:

# Header 1
## Header 2
### Header 3
#### Header 4
##### Header 5
###### Header 6. 

New lines are specified by two `\n\n` at the end of a line.  

You can also include blockquotes:

> This is a blockquote.

And code blocks:

```
function example() {
  console.log("This is an example code block.");
}
```
